overview: Tharan is a zero budget shortfilm with a one man technical crew directed by Varghese Paul. It's just an idea that relates actions of both the fungi(dandruff)and human.As it's only enough for fungi ( dandruff) to just eat over the dead skin and other particles in the head for survival,but it pulls out the hair too. Just like humans who only needs to eat what is in the earth,and there is no need to cut off trees. In the dandruff's case the boys shaves his hair,which ultimately kills the fungi. .In the human's case earth may rub off its trees with calamities and may erase the human species for self healing. In other words,it's just the survival of the earth.
title: STORY OF 2 DERMATOPHYTES THARAN ( DANDRUFF)
